document.full_text: an american who scouted targets for the 2008 pakistani militant raid on mumbai testified on wednesday about conversations he had with a chicago businessman accused of helping the attackers and a retired pakistani military officer.
document.title: u.s. trial on mumbai attacks hears of pakistan contacts
lines_and_colors: an american who scouted targets for the 2008 pakistani militant raid on mumbai testified on wednesday about conversations he had with a chicago businessman accused of helping the attackers and a retired pakistani military officer.
